William D. McVeigh

  1. Foster Name: William
  2. Foster Family: Matt and Sarah Miller
  3. Location of Family: David City, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: David City, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 8
  7. Date of Birth: 1889-11, Brooklyn, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1952-05, David City, NE
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: David City Banner Press, 5 February 1981; 1910 United States Federal Census; OTR, 128, 50; 1900 United States Federal Census; David City News, 21 October 1897; Wahoo Democrat, 14 October 1897; Eloise Thomsen Corres. (see Osterling).
